sentences.en: an energetic drive to get more customers
sentences.cn: 争取更多客户的十足干劲

sentences.en: Blackwell is 59, strong looking and enormously energetic.
sentences.cn: 布莱克韦尔59岁，身体强壮且精力极其充沛。

sentences.en: He is as energetic as ever.
He knew I was energetic and dynamic and would get things done.
sentences.cn: 他知道我精力充沛、生气勃勃，会把事情办成的。

sentences.en: He saw some energetic charging by the police and arrests being made.
sentences.cn: 他看见警察使劲朝人群冲了几次,逮捕了一些人.

sentences.en: Her son was an energetic, assertive boy, always ready to argue.
sentences.cn: 她的儿子是个精力充沛而意志坚定的孩子, 时刻准备着争论.

sentences.en: Quasars are the highly energetic cores of distant galaxies.
sentences.cn: 类星体是遥远星系的极为活跃的核心体.

sentences.en: The elderly man is quite energetic.
sentences.cn: 这位上了年纪的老人仍精力充沛.

sentences.en: The young man is handsome and energetic.
Time spent at Jumby Bay can be as energetic or as languid as you wish.
sentences.cn: 来鬼湾消磨时光，动静皆宜，尽可随心所欲。

sentences.en: Tremain's novel is altogether jauntier, more various and energetic than these quotations imply.
sentences.cn: 与这些引文给人的印象相比，特里曼的小说总的来说更加充满自信、富于变化，也更有活力。

sentences.en: We look for applicants who are numerate, computer-literate and energetic self-starters.
sentences.cn: 我们对求职者的要求是具备运算能力，熟练使用电脑，精力充沛而且工作积极主动。

words.tran_cn: 供给…能量；使精力充沛（等于energize）

trans.tran_cn: 积极主动的，精力旺盛的，剧烈的
trans.tran_en: having or needing a lot of energy or determination
